feed.title: Gowri Sankar
feed.subtitle: Computer Science student at the University of South Australia, Adelaide.

entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content:
Hi there. Welcome to my website. I just setup this site and I think I do not have to worry about security updates which is nice. I occasionally like to write about Music, Tech, Video Games and some thoughts.

At this moment, I’m exactly at the midway point. I have completed 3 semesters and there are 3 more to go. Meanwhile I’ve been enjoying my vacation working on some side projects and going camping, hiking and ice skating with friends.
entry.summary: Hi there. Welcome to my website. I just setup this site and I think I do not have to worry about security updates which is nice. I occasionally like to write about Music, Tech, Video Games and some thoughts.
